title: The unfriend custom service. Ban my account without give any reason.
body: This custom service said that he could ban any account without give any reason. I am sure that I never used the 3rd party software. However, the custom service insist that I used the 3rd party software and never give me any reason. I asked him to provide the provement. He is impolite and said that he could ban any account if he want!!!!! I really spend so much time and money on this account!
